issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I have what I believe might be a bug

sample code
http://zcentric.com/testingapp.tar.gz


So if you load the app and then load an image and scroll up right away and wait 5 seconds the next image will load but only the top half will be loaded

I have also seen the same issue if the height size of all the rows are different and if I scroll down to the last row it only shows the bottom top 1/3 of the row
fields.summary: Tableview and scrollToIndex problem scrolling to the bottom row
fields.environment:
Application Type: mobile 
Titanium SDK: 3.1.1.GA 
Platform & Version: iOS 6.1 
Device: iOS Simulator 
Host Operating System: OSX 10.8.3 
Titanium Studio: 3.1.1.201306112235

comments.body: Hi Mike, Can you provide a small reproducible test case that demonstrates this behavior?

Jamie,

I have one in the topic on my website it's a project and if you click add image scroll up and wait 5 seconds it will happen
Mike, It is much easier if you can create a small sample and paste it into the ticket, that way the issue is already isolated for us to look at.

We tried to reproduce this issue with the sample code you had provided with Titanium SDK 3.2.0.v20131209192649 and Alloy 1.3.0-beta. We were not able to reproduce this issue. We recommend you to please install the latest SDK and test your app. If you continue to get error, please send us a small test case with steps to reproduce.

h5. Test Environment 
Ti CLI 3.2.0-cr3
Titanium SDK: 3.2.0.v20131209192649
IOS Simulator 7.0
IOS SDK 7.0 
Alloy 1.3.0-beta
